title: The Joke's on Me
description: Former stand-up comic Frankie Goldberg left her family behind to pursue success. But fifteen years later, when a mudslide plummets her hopes, her home, and her entire collection of impractical footwear into the Pacific, she flees Los Angeles for her idyllic hometown. In this story about family love and redemption, Frankie craves comfort, but continually finds that the joke's on her.
author: Laurie Boris
